name: YouTube Music Beautifier
description: Elevate your YouTube Music Experience! Sing along to accurate time-synced lyrics, watch beautiful animated backgrounds, and control your playback from your other devices!
author: Natesh Vemuri

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https://ytm.nwvbug.com wss://ytm.nwvbug.com https://ytmbeta.nwvbug.com wss://ytmbeta.nwvbug.com http://127.0.0.1:7071 ws://127.0.0.1:7071 https://ytm-beautifier-server-257194130500.us-central1.run.app wss://ytm-beautifier-server-257194130500.us-central1.run.app;
